For the last 30 years, the scientific research literature has been formally addressing the topic of ‘'''W'''isdom’, especially as Western [[economies]] begin to transition from a Manufacturing & Industry Age model into a Science & Technology [[Information Age]] model.
 
For the last 30 years, the scientific research literature has been formally addressing the topic of ‘'''W'''isdom’, especially as Western [[economies]] begin to transition from a Manufacturing & Industry Age model into a Science & Technology [[Information Age]] model.
    −
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, is viewed as an integral component of the ‘'''D'''ata’ to ‘'''I'''nformation’ to ‘'''K'''nowledge’ scientific [[learning]] pathway.
+
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, is viewed as an integral component of the '''[[Data]]''' to '''[[Information]]''' to '''[[Knowledge]]''' scientific [[learning]] pathway. The DIKW [[scientific learning]] pathway, especially as practiced by [[scientific learning communities]] is intimately connected with the [[scientific method]] itself.
−
The DIKW scientific learning pathway is intimately connected with the [[scientific method]] itself.
       
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, could be viewed simply as ‘[[knowledge]] in context’. Yet functionally, ‘'''W'''isdom’ is far more textured and multidimensional.
 
‘'''W'''isdom’, from a scientific perspective, could be viewed simply as ‘[[knowledge]] in context’. Yet functionally, ‘'''W'''isdom’ is far more textured and multidimensional.
